text:
may be this error should be more explicit

``` Python
from nilearn import datasets, input_data
adhd = datasets.fetch_adhd(n_subjects=1)
masker = input_data.NiftiSpheresMasker(seeds=[(42, 11, 23)], radius=6,
                                       low_pass=.1)
signal = masker.fit_transform(adhd.func[0])
```

gives the following error

> unsupported operand type(s) for /: 'float' and 'NoneType'
title: Error for unspecfied TR and filtering in signal.clean
Error for unspecfied TR and filtering in signal.clean
